Key Match Events: Travis Jankowski robbed Andrew Vaughn of a game-winning homer with a leaping catch in the ninth inning
Corey Seager drove in the decisive run with a bloop single in the top of the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Gavin Sheets walked to load the bases
Lenyn Sosa hit a tying single in the fifth
Sosa was called for batter interference with two outs and two on in the seventh
Sosa was checked by an athletic trainer after getting plunked by a throw to second base ahead of the eighth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox have lost six in a row and 10 of 11 overall
The White Sox are 4-32 since the All-Star break, moving closer to the franchise record of 106 losses in 1970
The game was suspended due to a fast-moving storm and persistent rain
Others: Andrew Chafin gave Travis Jankowski a hug and offered to buy him a steak dinner
Rangers manager Bruce Bochy had to tone down his comments due to the lack of fans in the stands
Jacob deGrom's second minor league rehab start went well and he went to the bullpen for more work
